alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 5:53PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wallace and northwestern Logan Counties through 515 PM MDT/615 PM CDT/... At 453 PM MDT/553 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Wallace, or 16 miles northeast of Sharon Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Wallace and northwestern Logan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
